
# BOKU 
![boku](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/boku/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `boku` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] BOKU 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  BOKU is the global leader in online payments, allowing consumers to purchase goods and services with their wireless number, and charge to their mobile operator bill. BOKU brings bank-grade payments technology and mobile users together on the web, creating a trusted, accessible market for consumers, merchants and carriers alike. Based in San Francisco with offices in Europe and Asia, BOKU reaches over 3 billion consumers worldwide. With localization and support in 32 languages, BOKU operates in 65 countries, across 230 carriers globally. Leading Silicon Valley entrepreneurs and venture capitalists fund BOKU including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark Capital, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures and Khosla Ventures.Â
